import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Modal, Button, ListGroup, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' //import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' const SendCostModal = (props) => { const [rate, setRate] = useState(props) console.log('PROPS', rate.fromCurrency) const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); useEffect(() => { handleShow() }, []) return ( <> {/* */} Charges Summary Send amount 200 GDP Exchange rate 1 GBP = 1.34 USD

1 {`${rate.fromCurrency}`} = {rate.exchangeRate} {`${rate.toCurrency}`}

Fee 5.50 GBP Total amount to pay 205.50 GBP Receiver gets 260 USD {/* */} ); } export default SendCostModal
